meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Christianne Gadd Jennifer Morrow Ben Hemmens Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7114.

td.p: Christianne Gadd, an adjunct professor of history and American studies from Bethlehem, Pennsylvania
Jennifer Morrow, an editorial assistant from New York, New York
Ben Hemmens, a stay-at-home dad from Falls Church, Virginia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $43,200)

tr.td: HISTORY, OLD & NEW
THAT'S OXYMORONIC!
CLOTHING MODERNE
POE-ETRY
STATE OF THE OLD WESTERN
(Alex: You have to name the current state where the main action in the film occurs.)
WE 3

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '[Jennifer strikes a pose and sings, a la Steve Martin, when delivering her response.]
(Alex: Yes. [Smiling] Well done. I love it. Okay, uh, less than a minute to go now, Jennifer.)

King Tut

Jennifer
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1924 Howard Carter & the Egyptian government fought over the mummy case of this boy king')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1924 Howard Carter & the Egyptian government fought over the mummy case of this boy king

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Ben: What is a host?)
...
(Alex: [To Jennifer] You understand the category.)

a guest host

BenJennifer
')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "Saturday Night Live" has a visiting one for every show, including J.K. Simmons in January 2015

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Alex: Yes.)
[The end-of-round signal sounds.]
(Alex: And you didn\'t do any... [referring to Jennifer\'s posing after clue 23])
(Jennifer: [Sarcastically] Do you want me to?)
[Laughter]

the butcher, the baker & the candlestick maker

Jennifer
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_4', 'clue_J_1_4_stuck', '(Jennifer: Okay, uh, why not? I\'ll make it a True Daily Double.)
(Alex: Whoa, hello, all right. For $6,400, here is the clue for you...)
...
[Cheers and applause]
(Alex: You\'re throwing out these responses casually. And it\'s--it\'s wonderful, I love it. Go again.)

Bosworth

Jennifer
')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Ben
Jennifer
Christianne

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Ben
Jennifer
Christianne
SHE MARRIED A VEEP
LET'S GO TO THE ISLANDS
BIBLE BELTS
YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU'RE TALKING ABOUT
20th CENTURY NAMES
(Alex: And finally, not the German version of the category in the first round...)

tr.td: Ben
Jennifer
Christianne

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Jennifer, as she pulls them out again] Those drumsticks worked. Yes!)

$9,000

$9,600
JenniferWho is Zola?
$288
Émile Zola')
